DPXL.defaultvalues: ,,,,,,,,,,=select ton_tt from tontucthoi where ma_vt='[ma_vt]' and ma_kho ='[ma_kho]' and ma_tt1 ='[ma_tt1]' and ma_tt2 ='[ma_tt2]' and ma_tt3 ='[ma_tt3]' and ma_tt4 ='[ma_tt4]' and ma_tt5 ='[ma_tt5]',,,=exec GetGiaVon @[ma_kho]%p@[ma_vt]%p@[ma_dvt]%p@M[ngay_ct]%p@[ma_tt1]%p@[ma_tt2]%p@[ma_tt3]%p@[ma_tt4]%p@[ma_tt5],=[gia_von_nt]*M[ty_gia]![ma_vt]![ma_tt1]![ma_tt2]![ma_tt3]![ma_tt4]![ma_tt5]![ma_kho]![ma_dvt],=[sl_xuat]*[gia_von_nt]![ma_vt]![ma_tt1]![ma_tt2]![ma_tt3]![ma_tt4]![ma_tt5]!M[]![ma_kho]![ma_dvt],=[tien_xuat_nt]*M[ty_gia] ![sl_xuat]![gia_von_nt]![ma_vt]![ma_tt1]![ma_tt2]![ma_tt3]![ma_tt4]![ma_tt5]![ma_kho]![ma_dvt],= exec get_tk_vt @M[ma_dvcs]%p@[ma_kho]%p@[ma_vt],,,,,,,,=[ma_kho],,=[quy_doi_dv] * [sl_xuat],= exec get_tk_vt @M[ma_dvcs]%p@[ma_kho_n]%p@[ma_vt_n],
